column5: Getting out for the first time this year. I was hoping to get out on the main lake but the winds look like Ill be on the D or the Thames. Im guessing the shad are late in this year with the warm temps. Super stoked!!  Cant wait to try out my new handlebarz bumper board!!
If I were you I'd hit the Detroit. It looks like the shad are coming in thick right now. Good luck.
last i heard the fishing was still slow on the thames and the shad have not showed up in great numbers and as of a few days ago the lake  and thames were very muddy
